page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content:
This block is situated midway between the towns of {Arbroath }and {Montrose} on the east coast of Scotland.
{Farming}is the most obvious feature of the area and various crops are grown.
The centre of the area is the small village of {Inverkeilor}where housing, a primary school, a church, post office and store and a hotel are to be found. The area has many {clubs}and organisations and these are also based in the village.
The block is divided by the {A92 } Dundee to Aberdeen road and the main railway line to the north. The {Lunan {Water }runs through the north of the block.
